mapper.select: SELECT article_id, article_title, article_content, article_author, article_status, create_date, change_date FROM t_article WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_content, article_author, article_status, create_date, change_date FROM t_article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
SELECT article_id, article_title, article_content, article_author, article_status, create_date, change_date FROM t_article WHERE tag_id = #{tagId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article(article_title, article_content, article_author, article_status, user_id, create_date) VALUES (#{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleStatus}, #{userId}, #{createDate})
